patients.name: Brigid O'Sullivan
medical_history: Father died of heart disease and stroke
Husband died of heart attack in 2023

patients.name: Cian Murphy
medical_history: Father has high blood pressure and depression

patients.name: Orla Flanagan
medical_history: Father has high cholesterol and Type 2 diabetes
Family history of heart disease and diabetes

consultations.notes: Patient reports sleep disturbances and weight loss since husband's death. Adjustment difficulties with move from Kerry to Dublin. Diabetes well controlled with Metformin. Discussed grief counseling resources.
Follow-up for diabetes management. HbA1c stable at 7.1%. Knee pain worsening with Dublin weather. Referred to physiotherapy. Patient misses her old GP in Kerry.

Student health check. Reports poor sleep due to gaming and irregular study schedule. Discussed sleep hygiene. Suspects seasonal depression but reluctant to discuss mental health. Referred to counseling services.

Work stress affecting sleep and digestion. Irregular periods - discussed PCOS investigation. Vitamin D levels improved with supplementation. Recommended stress management techniques and ergonomic assessment.

preferences.notes: Better energy levels in morning, difficulty with Dublin transport in evening
Struggles with technology, daughter Siobh√°n helps with digital communication
Digital native, comfortable with tech, wants quick responses
Computer science student, likes to understand the 'why' behind medical advice
Professional communicator, time-conscious due to work demands

preferences.preference: Comfortable with health apps and telemedicine
preferences.notes: Uses fitness tracker, health apps, prefers online booking and results
